diff_hunk:
@@ -507,9 +513,21 @@ def check_file(f):
     extra_compile_args += ['-DWITH_CUDNN']
 
 if WITH_NNPACK:
-    main_libraries += ['nnpack', 'pthreadpool']
-    include_dirs.extend(NNPACK_INCLUDE_DIRS)
-    library_dirs.append(NNPACK_LIB_DIR)
+    if NNPACK_IS_USER_DEFINED:
+        main_libraries += ['nnpack', 'pthreadpool']
+        include_dirs.extend(NNPACK_INCLUDE_DIRS)
+        library_dirs.append(NNPACK_LIB_DIR)
+    else:
body: @apaszke - The headers are in the user's conda include directory. I discussed this with @ezyang and he suggested not to add this to `include_dirs` as then we are picking up all the other headers as well, which I guess can be problematic.
